channel.title: Technology on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Technology on Home

item.title: Welding
item.description: We ensure welding and inspection processes according to ISO 3834-2. MIG, MAG (131, 135), TIG (141) Qualification of workers for welding Welding is performed by trained welding personnel with a valid examination according to ČSN EN ISO 9606-1 for the respective welding method at the given quality degree according to ČSN EN 5817. International welding engineer (IWE) in our team. Non-destructive testing We perform visual test according to ČSN EN ISO 17637 Magnetic test according to ČSN EN ISO 17638 Ultrasound test according to ČSN EN ISO 17640

item.title: Laser cutting
item.description: Laser Genius+ 2040 6kW, PRIMA POWER Material Maximum thickness Construction steel 25mm Stainless steel 25mm Aluminium 25mm Copper 10mm Brass 10mm

item.title: Long welds automatization
item.description: The CTP 1350 device is designed for welding longitudinal angular and butt joints using the MIG/MAG method. Its main components consist of a support frame with a longitudinal positioning table for workpieces and a horizontal linear track with a traversing carriage. This track includes a carriage drive, wire feeders, technological torches with vertical and horizontal correction supports, welding torch holders, and a control unit. This equipment enables simultaneous welding from two sides, operated by remote control joysticks.

item.title: Assemblies
item.description: Besides classical engineering production, we offer our clients the production of all cooperation parts and consequent installation in complete assemblies of finished product.
